items.content_html: A lightweight, type-safe utility for Next.js server & client actions with built-in auth, RBAC, Zod validation, auto retries, and real-time toast feedback. Just write your DB logic & zod schema, for your server action, we handle validation, auth, errors, retries & UI feedback seamlessly out of the box. No extra code, just focus on your logic! üöÄ
items.title: SadiqVali786/safe-actions-state: A lightweight, type-safe utility for Next.js server & client actions with built-in auth, RBAC, Zod validation, auto retries, and real-time toast feedback. Just write your DB logic & zod schema, for your server action, we handle validation, auth, errors, retries & UI feedback seamlessly out of the box. No extra code, just focus on your logic! üöÄ

items.content_html: Wikipedia Clone is a simple web app that fetches Wikipedia search results based on user input. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it uses the Wikipedia API to display relevant article links dynamically. A great project for learning API integration and real-time search functionality. Fast, lightweight, and easy to use!
items.title: Rahul9969/Wikipedia-Clone: Wikipedia Clone is a simple web app that fetches Wikipedia search results based on user input. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it uses the Wikipedia API to display relevant article links dynamically. A great project for learning API integration and real-time search functionality. Fast, lightweight, and easy to use!

items.content_html: Zen - A Lightweight Reactive UI Framework üöÄ Zen is a fast, fine-grained reactive UI framework with no Virtual DOM. Inspired by Svelte, it uses Signal-based reactivity for direct, efficient DOM updates. Zen is lightweight, fast, and simple, making UI development seamless. Perfect for performance-focused apps! ‚ö°
